invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
minLength: This field must be at least {min} characters long.
maxLength: This field must be no more than {max} characters long.
passwordStrength: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
minValue: The value must be at least {min}.
dateInFuture: The date must be in the future.
dateInPast: The date must be in the past.
invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number.
invalidUsername: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.
invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Allowed types are {types}.
fileSizeExceeded: The file size must not exceed {size} MB.
termsAndConditions: You must accept the terms and conditions.
privacyPolicy: You must accept the privacy policy.
sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
unauthorizedAction: You are not authorized to perform this action.
accountLocked: Your account has been locked. Please contact support.
accountNotActivated: Your account has not been activated yet. Please check your email.
tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.
numericOnly: This field can only contain numbers.
alphabeticOnly: This field can only contain letters.
alphanumericOnly: This field can only contain letters and numbers.
invalidZipCode: Please enter a valid zip code.
invalidCreditCard: Please enter a valid credit card number.
invalidCVV: Please enter a valid CVV code.
expirationDateInvalid: Please enter a valid expiration date.
ageRestriction: You must be at least {age} years old.
invalidCurrency: Please enter a valid currency format.
maxAttemptsReached: You have reached the maximum number of attempts.
invalidMimeType: Invalid file type. Allowed MIME types are {mimeTypes}.
confirmDeletion: Are you sure you want to delete this?
duplicateEntry: This entry already exists. Please use a different value.
timeoutError: Request timed out. Please try again.
invalidBoolean: Invalid value. Expected true or false.
invalidIPAddress: Please enter a valid IP address.
futureDateRequired: The date must be in the future.
pastDateRequired: The date must be in the past.
